name: new-portfolio
description: - Locate the file location - In terminal run *bundle init* - In the Gem File add gems that you want to use with *gem 'jekyll', '~> 4.3', '>= 4.3.1'* - Once Gems are added run *bundle install* - Once all that is done and ready use *bundle exec jekyll serve* (The server will run on port 4000) - Load up *http://localhost:4000/* to see all the changes being made
